snippet: The Ferrari driver Fernando Alonso announced himself as a strong contender for the Formula One championship with a comfortable victory at the Chinese Grand Prix in Shanghai.
abstract: Ferrari driver Fernando Alonso announces himself as strong contender for Formula One championship with comfortable victory at Chinese Grand Prix in Shanghai.
lead_paragraph: The Ferrari driver Fernando Alonso announced himself as a strong contender for the Formula One championship with a comfortable victory at the Chinese Grand Prix in Shanghai.

headline.seo: Fernando Alonso Wins at Chinese Grand Prix
headline.main: Alonso Wins at Chinese Grand Prix
